reviewText: This film primarily shows beautiful sights of people, animals, and landscape in and around Kenya, East Africa. The soundtrack provided by Vangelis, Ladysmith Black Mambazo, and Miriam Makeba is awesome. The photography is very good study for anyone wanting to be a documentary photographer or ethnographer. Give this as a gift to that aspiring filmmaker that you know :) 5 stars all the way. No flaws on this one, and I bought it used!
